radiographic_examinations.findings: Inflammation of the head and uncinate process of the pancreas, no acute abnormalities in liver, gallbladder, spleen, right adrenal gland, right kidney, stomach, small bowel, or colon, few descending colonic diverticula without acute inflammation, normal appendix, no free intraperitoneal air or ascites, left kidney surgically absent, mild atherosclerotic changes in abdominal aorta, small fat-containing umbilical hernia, diffusely mildly atrophic pancreas, marked enlargement of prostate with central coarse calcifications.
